location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to Government of Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, forwarding a letter sent to Francis Warden by the Warehousekeeper at Bombay, . Torin, on 26 October, regarding twenty lots of shawl cloths being purchased below the retail price by Catchatoor Iohannes, Armenian merchant.
